title: Speed Drift Racing

headings.text: How to Play Speed Drift Racing?

controls: Use WASD or arrow keys to control the car.
Steer: Tap arrow buttons on left bottom of your screenSpeed/Slow Down: Tap and hold the gas and brake pedals on right bottom of your screen
content.howToPlay: Start with the first level and complete the 2 laps before other cars.Use arrow keys to control the car.Pay close attention to the bends, as these cars are designed to drift in a crazy way.If you hit an object, you can still continue racing, but it's better to hurry up even more!Each level completion will bring you 250 coins, plus you'll get bonus coins based on where you completed the race. Keep racing to unlock more rewards!There are 20 levels with increasing difficulty. Finish them all!

fullContent: Home› RacingSpeed Drift RacingBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenSpeed Drift Racing is a free online racing game for arcade game lovers. In a simplistic 2D setting with 3 opponents ahead of you, you will drift through sharp bends and make cool maneuvers to arrive at the finish line first.Get ready to test your skills on the slippery roads of Speed Drift Racing! This online car game is all about mastering the art of precision drifting.ControlsComputersUse WASD or arrow keys to control the car. MobilesSteer: Tap arrow buttons on left bottom of your screenSpeed/Slow Down: Tap and hold the gas and brake pedals on right bottom of your screenHow to Play Speed Drift Racing?Start with the first level and complete the 2 laps before other cars.Use arrow keys to control the car.Pay close attention to the bends, as these cars are designed to drift in a crazy way.If you hit an object, you can still continue racing, but it's better to hurry up even more!Each level completion will bring you 250 coins, plus you'll get bonus coins based on where you completed the race. Keep racing to unlock more rewards!There are 20 levels with increasing difficulty. Finish them all!Garage Section22 different sports cars are waiting to be unlocked in the garage, each with exceptional capabilities such as speed, precision, and brake power, as well as a cool look.As you progress through the levels, you'll need more expensive cars to catch up with the opponents.So save your coins and buy the dream Formula 1 car in Speed Drift Racing!Gamie's ReviewI really liked how the camera angle is narrow so that you'll not know if you're approaching a bend or not unless you're very close to it. This forces players to respond to the environment right in time. Additionally, if you brake too hard, the car willl probably spin out, so my advice is to keep calm and apply the brakes in a controlled manner.Reminiscent of Police Chase Drifter, but in a racing setting, offers lots of fun if you're looking for a simple game with intuitive controls.DeveloperFreezeNova created Speed Drift Racing.More Car Games OnlineWe have a great library of car games online.
